subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Third-seeded Novak Djokovic of Serbia began his defense of his Indian Wells Masters series title with a straight-sets victory over the 54th-ranked Argentine Martin Vassallo Arguello, 7-5, 6-4, advancing to the third round in Indian Wells, Calif. Last year’s surprise men’s finalist, Mardy Fish, lost, 7-6 (4), 7-6 (1), to Jeremy Chardy of France.
